import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Carousel from '../components/Carousel'; import { fetchProducts } from '../services/api'; import { useAuthStore } from '../store/useAuthStore'; const Home = () => { const [featuredProducts, setFeaturedProducts] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const user = useAuthStore((state) => state.user); useEffect(() => { const getProducts = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const products = await fetchProducts(); setFeaturedProducts(products.slice(0, 6)); setLoading(false); } catch (err) { console.error('Failed to fetch products', err); setLoading(false); } }; getProducts(); }, []); return (
{/* Hero Banner */}

Discover the latest trends & premium products for your lifestyle.

Shop Now {!user && ( Sign Up )}

{feature.title}

{feature.desc}

))}

)} {/* Newsletter */}

); }; export default Home;
